thread.section_title: allbeauty.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of allbeauty.com
thread.title: Susan

author: Susan
title: Susan
text: This was the first time I had ordered from AllBeauty and to say I was impressed was an understatement. From ordering to delivery took just days and the parcel had been packed properly so its contents were not damaged. The prices are amazing - which in my case, were cheaper than duty free at the airport and I was kept informed at all stages as to where my parcel was at. Will definitely be coming back.
